translations: n.忙碌的场所，繁忙的地方；蜂房，蜂箱；蜂群；蜂窝状物体

sentences.sentence: A dark cloud of bees comes swarming out of the hive.
sentences.translation: 黑压压的一大群蜜蜂从那座蜂巢涌过来。

sentences.sentence: Glass hives offer a close-up view of the bees at work, with the queen bee in each hive marked by a white dot.
sentences.translation: 玻璃蜂房可以近距离观察工作中的蜜蜂，每个蜂房的蜂王都被打上白点标记。

sentences.sentence: Tapping on the hive excited the bees.
